title: deranking
body:
this has come to the 2nd time in a row now, after getting plat2 getting 1 win to get off 0 lp then 3 losses in a row and i instant derank? i always thought that there was some shield that prevented instant deranking when you hit 0 lp. i would assume its because my mmr is lower but i am still getting over 20 lp for a win and under 16 for a loss so i am unsure.
can someone clear this info up please its annoying af

replies.body:
I got the ol' investigator hat out for this one ;)


 From what I see, after you got promoted, you actually; _Won a game, lost a game, won a game, lost 3 games in a row and got demoted back to Platinum 3._
 
 I'm referring to these games you played [here](https://i.gyazo.com/af461115861dca902e455807199878fa.png) right after you got promoted to Platinum 2.


 
> The [shield you are referring to](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h6q3) **only protects you from demotion in your first 3 games.** You played a total of 6 games according to me, and 4 games according to you. 
> 
> Either way, you've played more than 3 games and therefore you were no longer shielded from demotion by the 3rd game.
